enhanced_description: Hindustan Recruitment, established in Delhi in 2020, is a leading provider of professional HR services, specializing in Staff Augmentation, Human Resourcing, Contract Hiring, and Permanent Hiring. The company leverages its nationwide network of recruitment experts who work on-site with clients, offering a comprehensive suite of services including executive search, senior and middle-level hiring, HR consulting, career counseling, career transition services, global sourcing, market intelligence, and recruiter training programs. Hindustan Recruitment adopts a personalized approach to connect skilled candidates with suitable job opportunities, aiming to help businesses hire top talent faster and more efficiently while also supporting broader HR functions like Performance Management and Leadership Development & Succession Planning.
